title.rendered: 2022 World Cup in Qatar Round of 16 & Quarter-Final Travel Packages

content.rendered:
World Cup in Qatar Round of 16 & Quarter-Final Packages

The intensity at the 2022 World Cup will increase as the action shifts to the knockout rounds. Only half of the teams in the tournament remain as the Round of 16 gets underway. With each match now sudden death elimination, the stakes are higher and the matches get more and more exciting with each round. It’s a great time to experience the tournament and we’d love to help you plan your custom itinerary.

The details of your World Cup Round of 16 & Quarter-Final travel package are up to you. You choose your match day experiences, and we’ll complete the itinerary with first class accommodations, transfers, and any other extras that will complete your desired experience. Our dedicated team will be there for you every step of the way.

Complete 7-night 2022 World Cup Round of 16 & Quarter-Final Packages start at $9,275 per person. To get started planning your 2022 World Cup experience, contact one of our Sports Travel Specialists at 1-800-465-1765 or submit a Custom Trip Quote request.
